quote: I never think about my style but just try and make the pictures look believable.

To be persuasive we must be believable; to be believable we must be credible; credible we must be truthful.

You don't wear all your jewellery at once. You're much more believable if you talk in your own voice.

I love insane, stupid comedy, but I can only make it work if it's a character I can give some history to and make real. Like the guy I played in 'Little Miss Sunshine.' He's a maniac, but to me he was absolutely believable.

I will say I was a lot bigger as Superman. A lot bigger. I'm not saying how much. It's modesty about the weight - I've always been worried about my weight - but I also don't want to invite that debate: 'Henry weighs this, so he's the perfect Superman.' Or, 'Henry doesn't weigh this, and therefore he's not believable in the role.'

Those three things are so vitally important.
